p: As previously described, Gn and Gc proteins exist as a heterodimer on the viral surface [ 15, 27]. Next, we superimposed the Gn component of our NAb–Gn docking model onto a reported model of assembled RVFV Gn–Gc (PDB ID: 6F9F). The results show that the sites in Gn that supporting binding of NAbs were close to the fusion loop in Gc ( Figure 7).
